News.Title: Sadbav Shipping Secures $12.27 Million ONGC Contract for M.V. Canara Pride
News.Summary: Sadbav Shipping has commenced operations under a contract with ONGC valued at USD 12.27 million. The company's vessel M.V. Canara Pride has started work under this agreement with the oil and gas company.

News.Title: Sadhav Shipping and United Petro Shipping Sign MoU with Odisha Government
News.Summary: Sadhav Shipping and United Petro Shipping have entered into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Government of Odisha. The agreement involves an initial investment of 56.37 billion rupees in Jagatsinghpur/Kendrapada.

News.Title: Sadhav Shipping and United Petro Shipping Sign MOU with Odisha Government
News.Summary: Sadhav Shipping and United Petro Shipping have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with the Government of Odisha. The agreement involves an initial investment of 56.37 billion rupees in Jagatsinghpur or Kendrapada district.

News.Title: Sadhav Shipping Enters Joint Venture with United Petro Shipping
News.Summary: Sadhav Shipping has formed a joint venture with United Petro Shipping to establish an offshore supply base in India. This strategic partnership aims to enhance their capabilities in the offshore supply sector.
